name: KoolKiller
description:
A tiny exploration first-person platformer made in two weeks for the RainbowJam 2022 "Here to stay".

Explore the cityscape and set your own checkpoints by putting stickers on any solid surface. The stickers are permanent: They can appear in other people's games  and you can see others' as well. The more people playing the game, the more stickers are paved all over the city (there is an upper limit at the moment because of performance issues).

Controls

  • WASD
  • E - Interact
  • F - Place sticker
  • SPACE - Jump

Special abilities

  • High Jump (Left mosue button) - while in air, jump again upwards
  • Dash (Right mouse button - quickly dash towards a solid surface

Used assets

  • "Dorila y Mello" by Popoi, CC-BY
  • "I Used To Love Hip-Hop" by Audiobringer, CC-BY-NC
  • "Ronin", by EXETEXE, CC-BY
  • "Left To Hurt", by Blackbird Blackbird, CC-BY-NC

Credits

This game was created by fenchel (@fenchel_)
